content.rendered:
Monday, December 16, 2024
Today is a “C” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Attention Grade 7 Chorus Students- Reminder that the Soprano section has a practice today during Flex. Please check in with your Flex teachers and then report to the Chorus room.
  • A Hand Up Club meets today in room 278. Please join us for a snack and holiday fun!
  • There is a student council meeting on Monday December 16 in Mrs. Kerls’ room.
  • Candy cane grams are back! Starting on Tuesday, December 17 student council will be selling candy cane grams outside of cafe 1 from 12/17-12/19 or while supplies last. Each candy gram will be $1.00.
  • MAGSA’s next meeting will be Wednesday, December 18th in room 138.
  • French Club will meet on Wednesday, December 18 in room E142 after school. All students are welcome, even if you don’t take French. Late bus passes will be provided. Any questions, contact Ms. Decker.
  • To prepare for our competition in February, Math Club will be meeting every Wednesday after school in Room R232. All students grades 6-8 are welcome.
  • Best Buddies Club is meeting on Wednesday the 18th from 2:20-3:00 in the Large Group Room. See Miss Douglas with any questions. Can’t wait to see you there!
  • Attention Ski Club members! Bus lists are now posted in both cafeterias. Please check that your name is on the list, know your bus number and find a friend to sit with. Remember that our first day of skiing is Thursday, January 9.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
